content: There are dozens and dozens of these materials scattered across the game's chapters and you will often need to return to a chapter to get some more materials. So, it pays to know where to find them.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Crafting_Materials.md', within the main section titled 'Crafting Materials'.
The content is as follows:
There are dozens and dozens of these materials scattered across the game's chapters and you will often need to return to a chapter to get some more materials. So, it pays to know where to find them.
